head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BELL, DR. JOHN S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BELL, DR. JOHN S.

block.p: BELL-Dr. John S. (Retired Professor of English, NYCTC). On August 4, 2000. Beloved husband of Rita. Devoted father of Richard, Jonathan, Ian and Melissa. Loving grandfather of Joshua, Kyle and Robert. Brother of Alexander and Patricia. Mass Tuesday, 12 noon, at St. John's Episcopal Church. Visitation Sunday, 7-9, and Monday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at McLaughlin & Sons, Third Avenue at 97th Street.
